author: jstrachan
msg: applied patch for CAMEL-109 from Aaron Crickenberger with huge thanks! Incidentally I figured this should be the default behaviour - so I've enabled the preservation of file names by default, which makes lots of sense

author: jstrachan
msg: added mandatory dependency on camel-activemq; since we use the pooling for sending via JmsTemplate

author: bdelacretaz
msg: fix date format in pinpoint lab event

author: jstrachan
msg: provided a bean() method on the DSL in addition to the beanRef() method so folks can easily bind to a bean in the DSL. Also made the camel-example-spring a little more interesting, sending messages by default
